Author: Brian Santo
Article: Cadence Design Systems is purchasing National Instruments subsidiary AWR Corp. for $160 million. In conjunction with the acquisition, Cadence and NI, which have been working together for some time, have also entered a strategic alliance to work in tandem to serve mutual customers in the communications sector. AWR also has more experience with III-V semiconductors that out-perform silicon in high-frequency devices.
